title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I am getting the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Can you please explain what this error message means?
OB: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), the following error message is displayed: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: When viewing the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR:
1. Open a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant).
2. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy.
3. Observe the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
